queries.name: Churn - Subscriptions based on Internet Service - Universal
queries.query:
select platform, churn, count(*) as event_count from main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_app_events inner join main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_users using (user_id) where platform is not null
group by platform, churn

queries.name: Churn - Avg Monthly Charges by Payment Method - Universal
Churn - Amount sales per month - Universal
queries.query:
SELECT sum(amount), date_format(to_timestamp(churn_users.creation_date, "MM-dd-yyyy H:mm:ss"), "yyyy-MM") m FROM main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_orders o 
		INNER JOIN main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_users using (user_id)
			group by m

queries.name: Churn - Customers churned - Universal
queries.query: SELECT count(*) as past_churn FROM main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_users WHERE churn=1;

queries.name: Churn - Total MRR
queries.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/10 as MRR FROM main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_orders);

queries.name: Churn - Churn by Gender - Universal
queries.query: SELECT gender, count(gender) as total_churn FROM main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_features where churn = 1 GROUP BY gender

query.name: Churn - Subscriptions based on Internet Service - Universal
query.query:
select platform, churn, count(*) as event_count from main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_app_events inner join main__build.dbdemos_retail_c360.churn_users using (user_id) where platform is not null
group by platform, churn
